job.title: Lead Software Engineer
job.industry: Information Technology and Services,Staffing and Recruiting,Human Resources
job.description: JavaScriptbrbrLocation RemotebrbrPay150165K AnnuallybrbrstronguJob OverviewbrbrustrongSeeking great Software Engineer who can help build out company platform From ordering to customer accounts to product catalogs and pricing youll work across the sets of services and functionality we provide to customers The ideal candidate will be able to collaborate with our topnotch engineering team amp product managers and build great services and features for our customers and then work with our highlyskilled engineers in both code reviews and architecture discussions to help drive forward a cohesive code basebrbrstronguIn This Role You Willbrustrongulli Develop new backend functionality amp componentslili Help migrate our functionality and services to GCPlili Mentor developers on coding and SDLC best practiceslili Help maintain a cohesive wellengineered code baselili Lead a team of engineers and participate in a collaborative code review environmentlili Drive engineering efficiency improvements through build tooling CICD pipeline improvements architectural improvement tech debt paydown etcbrliulstronguRequirementsbrustrongulli Ecommerce Experiencelili Strong ES6ES7 JS React Angular Vue C experiencelili MySql TSQL Management and Optimizationlili Experience with RESTful APIs and concepts interested in Serverless architectures  frameworks and microserviceslili GCP or AWSlili Experience with CICD tools such as Travis Cloud build and deploying code to productionlili Experience with JS unit and integration testing frameworkslili Proven ability to design and implement robust and scalable enterprise systemslili Operations experience an asset capacity planning incident response security scanning etclili MLM or Direct sales with direct involvement with commissionslili Experience creating and maintaining GraphQL endpointsliul
